patthana15.75:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ savitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.75:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ savitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana15.75:3.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana15.75:4.1_0: Saraṇaṁ avitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.75:4.1_1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana15.75:5.1_0: Araṇaṁ avitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
